DataElement.preferredName: Whole-Brain Radiotherapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that are related to Radiation treatment modality used as major component in treatment of primary and metastatic brain tumors as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Whole-Brain Radiotherapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Radiation treatment modality used as major component in treatment of primary and metastatic brain tumors. This is a standard treatment for multiple brain metastases._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Radiation treatment modality used as major component in treatment of primary and metastatic brain tumors. This is a standard treatment for multiple brain metastases.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is WBRT recommended due to an
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is WBRT recommended due to any medical reasons or logistic limitations as determined by the treating physician?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior whole brain radiation therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient has received previous radiation, including whole brain radiation, was this done greater than or equal to 7 days of study registration?
